mapper.update: update t_course set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classify = #{classify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classify_name = #{classifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sub_classify = #{subClassify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sub_classify_name = #{subClassifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=BIT}, duration = #{duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, study_count = #{studyCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, brief = #{brief,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, classify, classify_name, sub_classify, sub_classify_name, username, level, duration, study_count, weight, brief from t_course where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, name, classify, classify_name, sub_classify, sub_classify_name, username, level, duration, study_count, weight, brief from t_course ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM t_course ORDER BY study_count DESC LIMIT #{arg0},#{arg1}
select * from t_course where name like '%${text}%' or username like '%${text}%' or classify_name like '%${text}%' or sub_classify_name like '%${text}%'
select * from t_course where name like '%${text}%' or username like '%${text}%' or classify_name like '%${text}%' or sub_classify_name like '%${text}%' LIMIT #{st},#{pa}
